dcterms:description: The dataset consists of actual Twitter tweets collected from various points in time, with a training set containing 3,834 tweets, approximately half of which are ironic and half non-ironic. The test set includes 311 ironic and 473 non-ironic tweets, making it a widely used benchmark for irony detection.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2018 Task 3 dataset
